page.title: 13HOUSING
page.content: Most inhabitants live in {owner_occupied houses.}Many of these are{cottages}that are very old that have been{renovated}to a very high standard of comfort. {Property prices}in the area are at a {premium}as it is a desirable area in which to live. It is close enough to major towns and cities such as {Birmingham, Wolverhampton}and {Worcester}to make{commuting}to work easy. There are some{council houses}in the area, but no{estates.}The council houses are most attractive. Many of the{front gardens}are filled with plants and flowers that are associated with the{cottage gardens}of many years ago.
